meta.name: Zork I: The Great Underground Empire
meta.author: Infocom (converted by PyMeshZork)
meta.description: The classic text adventure game - West of House and surrounding areas

whous.name: West of House
whous.description_first: You are standing in an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door.

exits.message: The door is boarded and you can't remove the boards.

nhous.name: North of House
nhous.description_first: You are facing the north side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are boarded up. To the north a narrow path winds through the trees.

shous.name: South of House
shous.description_first: You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are boarded.

ehous.name: Behind House
ehous.description_first: You are behind the white house. A path leads into the forest to the east. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar.

kitch.name: Kitchen
kitch.description_first: You are in the kitchen of the white house. A table seems to have been used recently for the preparation of food. A passage leads to the west and a dark staircase can be seen leading upward. A dark chimney leads down and to the east is a small window which is open.

exits.message: Only Santa Claus climbs down chimneys.

lroom.name: Living Room
lroom.description_first: You are in the living room. There is a doorway to the east, a wooden door with strange gothic lettering to the west, which appears to be nailed shut, a trophy case, and a large oriental rug in the center of the room.

attic.name: Attic
attic.description_first: This is the attic. The only exit is a stairway leading down. A large coil of rope is lying in the corner. On a table is a nasty-looking knife.

cella.name: Cellar
cella.description_first: You are in a dark and damp cellar with a narrow passageway leading north, and a crawlway to the south. On the west is the bottom of a steep metal ramp which is unclimbable.

exits.message: The ramp is too steep to climb.

mtrol.name: Troll Room
mtrol.description_first: This is a small room with passages to the east and south and a forbidding hole leading west. Bloodstains and deep scratches (perhaps made by straining fingers) mar the walls.

exits.message: The troll fends you off with a menacing gesture.

fore1.name: Forest
fore1.description_first: This is a forest, with trees in all directions. To the east, there appears to be sunlight.

fore3.name: Forest Path
fore3.description_first: This is a path winding through a dimly lit forest. The path heads north-south here. One particularly large tree with some low branches stands at the edge of the path.

clear.name: Clearing
clear.description_first: You are in a clearing, with a forest surrounding you on all sides. A path leads south.

uptree.name: Up a Tree
uptree.description_first: You are about 10 feet above the ground nestled among some large branches. The nearest branch above you is above your reach. Beside you on the branch is a small bird's nest.

mailb.name: small mailbox
mailb.description: There is a small mailbox here.
mailb.examine: The mailbox is a small mailbox.

leafl.name: leaflet
leafl.examine: The leaflet is a small piece of paper.
leafl.read_text:
WELCOME TO ZORK!

ZORK is a game of adventure, danger, and low cunning. In it you will explore some of the most amazing territory ever seen by mortals. No computer should be without one!

sword.name: elvish sword
sword.description: Above the trophy case hangs an elvish sword of great antiquity.
sword.examine: The sword is of exquisite craftsmanship. It is inscribed with ancient elvish runes.

lamp.name: brass lantern
lamp.description: There is a brass lantern (battery-powered) here.
lamp.examine: The lamp is a battery-powered brass lantern.

rug.name: oriental rug
rug.examine: The rug is extremely beautiful and tightly woven. It does not appear to be attached to the floor.

rope.name: coil of rope
rope.description: A large coil of rope is lying in the corner.
rope.examine: The rope is strong and about 50 feet long.

knife.name: nasty knife
knife.description: On a table is a nasty-looking knife.
knife.examine: The knife looks very sharp and unpleasant.

troll.name: troll
troll.description: A nasty-looking troll, brandishing a bloody axe, blocks all passages out of the room.
troll.examine: The troll is a large, nasty creature that wants nothing more than to kill you.

axe.name: bloody axe
axe.examine: The axe is covered in blood and looks extremely dangerous.

sack.name: brown sack
sack.description: On the table is an elongated brown sack, smelling of hot peppers.
sack.examine: The sack is an ordinary brown sack.

garli.name: clove of garlic
garli.examine: The garlic is a standard cooking ingredient.

bottl.name: glass bottle
bottl.description: A bottle is sitting on the table.
bottl.examine: The glass bottle contains a quantity of water.

nest.name: bird's nest
nest.description: Beside you on the branch is a small bird's nest.
nest.examine: The nest looks like it was made by a songbird of some kind.

egg.name: jewel-encrusted egg
egg.examine: The egg is covered with beautiful jewels that glitter in the light.
